thread.title: BRIEF-Pan Orient Energy Corp posts Q4 Loss Per Share C$0.01

title: BRIEF-Pan Orient Energy Corp posts Q4 Loss Per Share C$0.01
text: March 22, 2018 / 12:48 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Pan Orient Energy Corp posts Q4 Loss Per Share C$0.01 Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Pan Orient Energy Corp: * PAN ORIENT ENERGY CORP: 2017 YEAR END FINANCIAL & OPERATING RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE C$0.01 * ‍FOR Q4 RECORDED TOTAL CORPORATE FFO $0.01 PER SHARE​, WHICH INCLUDES ECONOMIC RESULTS OF 50.01% INTEREST IN THAILAND JV * PAN ORIENT ENERGY - ‍2018 THAILAND CAPITAL PROGRAM EXPECTED TO INCLUDE 1 EXPLORATION WELL, AN APPRAISAL WELL AT L53-B AND A MULTI-WELL WORKOVER PROGRAM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
